title: Naughty Neuro
description: It’s a high I never want to stop. Job I love, big money, fast cars. Good friends and fine women. Saving lives one brain at a time.I’ve got it all…Except the one treasure I can’t touch.Bella Garrett.For seven years she’s tortured me.Her smile, compassion, and a body that kills me.Every. Damn. Time.It’s like she knows but enjoys my pain anyway.I promised to be good,keep my hands to myself.Until they told me she’s my new resident.Six months working underneath me?No man is that strong.Be professional.Share your knowledge.Make her the best she can be.The risk is worth the reward…But the price I pay, could be losing it all.
author: Karen Deen
